releaseNotes:
Noty v1.3 - Widget Improvements

• Improved Widget Filtering: Toggle between "Show Active" and "Show All" modes
• Better Task Visibility: Completed tasks remain visible in "Show All" mode
• Two-way Task Management: Added ability to uncheck tasks directly from widget
• Enhanced Visual Feedback: Better UI distinction for completed tasks
• Platform Updates: Updated target SDK to Android 35
• Backend Improvements: Enhanced update system with proper caching
• Performance Optimizations: General bug fixes and improvements
